attributes.action: Build a charter city for the people of Hong Kong here in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: With China's new national security law set to be imposed upon Hong Kong in violation of the Sino-British Joint Declaration, it is necessary to protect international law and the people of Hong Kong. Only be giving the people full citizenship and protection to travel here, building them a new sustainable and high tech city on the coast, can we protect their liberty, and allow them to live their best lives.
attributes.background: The UK Government declares its full support for the people of Hong Kong, with China in violation of the Sino-British Joint Declaration. The UK shall begin construction of a new sustainable coastal city to bring the people of Hong Kong here. Provide provisional accommodation as well.
